subject: Problem in creating JUnit test case
msgSnippet: Hi All I am trying to create a test suite in JUnit eclipse project to test the exception handelling of 11 API s. The process I am following is 1. Create a test
messageBody:
Hi All
I am trying to create a test suite in JUnit eclipse project to test the exception handelling of 11 API's.

The process I am following is

1. Create a test folder inside the project which needs to be tested. This folder is going to contain test classes
2. When Inside this folder I am right clicking to obtain the new JUnit test case creation wizard. I am getting an error


The error says the "source folder is not a Java project". The above steps followed by me are in reference to a doccument present on the internet @
http://open.ncsu.edu/se/tutorials/junit

I have one more doubt, Why do we use the setUP(), tearDown() and constructor() while working with the test case creation wizard.

Please help me to come up with a solution of this.


Thanks in Advance

Avinash
